usa.name: United States of America
usa.climate: Varied: arctic to tropical, deserts to humid coasts
usa.speciality: Iconic cities, national parks, cultural diversity
usa.culture: A melting pot of cultures, cuisines, music, and arts.

essentialTips.title: Payments
essentialTips.note: Cards widely accepted; tipping is customary (15–20%).

essentialTips.title: Distances
essentialTips.note: Cities can be far apart—plan flights or long drives.

faqs.a: Many travelers use ESTA (Visa Waiver Program); others need a B-2 visa.
Speed limits vary by state; carry your license and insurance.
